original_text: These have come so that the proven genuineness of your faith—of greater worth than gold, which perishes even though refined by fire—may result in praise, glory and honor when Jesus Christ is revealed.
korean_text: 너희 믿음의 확실함은 불로 연단하여도 없어질 금보다 더 귀하여 예수 그리스도께서 나타나실 때에 칭찬과 영광과 존귀를 얻게 할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: so that the proven genuineness of your faith
which perishes even though refined by fire
may result in praise, glory and honor
sentences.korean_translation: 칭찬과 영광과 존귀를 이루게 하려 함이라
